title: [BUG] Error Converting SKData

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body: Sorry for the very late response. Is this still an issue? It may have been related to an incompatibility of the Xamarin/.NET/.NET Standard versions?

comments.author: seoduda
comments.body:
Hello there,


This is no longer an issue for me.
Using updated versions and now it works fine.


Thanks for your help!
